entry.title: Bridal wedding nail art style collection
entry.content:
On the day of the wedding, every bride will put on her wedding dress, the most charming makeup and present the most exquisite state. However the bride hand maintenance is also very important, the majority of women should also pay attention to nail care. It is indispensable to add a grace and elegance to the girls who are about to get married on their wedding day. Next, let the blogger recommend some bridal wedding nail style pictures to the girls, I hope it can help you.

1.How to choose a wedding nail art style that suits you

Let's first consider the base length and shape of the nail art. If some brides have slightly short fingers and nails, then we can leave the nails long in advance, around 2-4mm. Then let the nail art staff help you to trim tiny squares or oval shape, which can slightly elongate the sense of the line of the hand. However, if you have slightly thicker fingers, it is not recommended to leave your nails long, as it will look a bit chunky. Oval nails will look longer because they are more slender and can generally achieve the elongated effect that girls want. But nails should never be left too long because they will look too sharp. In addition to the inconvenience of movement, it is also visually sharper. And the design of the square and round shape can also add a certain amount of femininity.

2.What kind of nail art shape suits me best?

The right shape for nail art varies from person to person. There are 5 types of nail art shapes: Oval, Square, Oval and Square, Round and Almond.
Square nails (suitable for people: wide nail bed, thin fingers)
Square round nails (suitable for people: narrow nail bed, long fingers)
Oval nails (for people with short nail beds and long hands)
Round (for people: short nail bed, do not like to keep long nails)

Nowadays, the more popular ones are oval and square, because they feel more like long fingers. But specifically which is better? It is better to take your own hand shape as a reference. Only with reference to the shape of the hand can you choose the right nail type, because of the way you can play the best complementary effect.

Nowadays, weddings are all about coordination. From the wedding dress to the décor and accessories, it's all about unity of style. Our nails, of course, must also "follow the trend". If a pair of gothic style hands appear in a small fresh rustic wedding, the scene is unimaginable.

3.Bridal wedding nail art styles

Elegant and feminine nail art

Whether it is a Chinese or Western wedding, red is the primary choice for most brides. This tone of color makes the bride's hands appear whiter. Adding pearlescent silver and white accents to the rest of the fingers is also very good in the photo shoot. Not only does it look festive and also very noble, but it also highlights the femininity of the little family.

Pink girly nails art

If you are a bride who is playful and cute, we can choose some gradient colors and sweet styles of nail art. If you are a bride with short nails, don't worry, this nail art will not only make your short nails look cute, but also add a girly style to your long fingers. We can try fading from light pink to dark. Whether this manicure is a single color or you continue to add patterns, you will look pink and girly.

Simple and fresh nail art

With the development of society, more and more brides love the fresh style of nail art. The simple pink color nail is also the first choice of many brides. Its simple sense of lines under the base tone of powder blue and gray powder, and then combined with the European atmosphere full of flowers and patterns, it will look very delicate and atmospheric. When you do this nail art, the pure temperament and freshness at first glance undoubtedly under the pure white wedding dress.

Fantasy & Creative Nail Art

This nail art is the most recent internet celebrity nail art. It has a monochromatic nail polish as the base color, and then adding different hand-painted patterns of the same color will produce a mixed color base effect. Some of these starry shades of precious blue will give it a psychedelic starry sky effect as if the Milky Way is flowing. In addition to the visual sparkle and special, it will produce a dignified and gorgeous feeling when paired with a diamond ring in the photographer's shoot.

Morandi Color Nail Art

If you want to talk about what is the popular color for nail art recently, you can't fail to mention the color Morandi. This color with a gray scale itself carries a cool feeling and is perfect for mixing and matching with various colors. Whether it's a girly peach heart hand-painted color or a mature rhythm gray-brown color mix and match is very good.

Cute Girl Nail Art

Most of the brides who have just entered the marriage hall still retain a little bit of girlishness, because they have not yet fully assumed the role of wife and mother. Therefore, a cute girly bridal nail art is more likely to arouse your passion for fantasy and romance.
Pink nail art can be chosen from glassy or bean-sand color, which looks more clear and gentle. Or you can also choose stickers with star elements, while the powder blue color is more recognizable than the traditional star nails, which look like watercolor paintings.

Metallic Cool Nail Art

Not every bride likes a dreamy and romantic wedding theme. If you want a cool and individual look, you can totally go for a metallic nail art.

Metallic nail art makes you feel like a cool rocker. This nail art doesn't need to be too complicated, just put on a metallic patch and you're full of personality. If you think it's not enough, you can also try sprinkling.

Cartoon Style Nail Art

If the bride is more girly, then cartoon nail art must be very suitable. This cartoon style bridal red nail art uses a red bottom and a fortune cat graphic, which is quite a good symbol. Of course cartoon characters can also be Santa Claus, Wanted, etc. The bride can choose her own.

4. How do you take care of my nails after removing them?

1、Do not chew nails or tear dead skin with your hands
Many brides do their nails for the wedding and rarely do it on weekdays. Therefore, they do not pay much attention to the maintenance of the nail after removal, and some people are used to chewing nails or tearing the dead skin with their hands, which not only hurts the nails, but also makes the hands unsightly.

2、Apply moisturizer or finger edge oil
After removing your nails, it is best not to do nail art for a short period of time, so you can leave a "window period" to take care of it and insist on applying moisturizer or finger edge oil every day.

3、Try not to leave your nails too long after removing them

entry.title: The most beautiful nail collection of internet celebrities in 2021
entry.content:
What kind of nail art do you girls like to do in winter? The blogger, who is self-absorbed and beautiful, just did a nail for herself today and couldn't resist sharing with you some types of nail art that are suitable for winter and look good. The winter weather is dry, and hands are especially prone to roughness and cracking, so you can't be lazy and not give your hands the care they need. Remember to apply hand cream to your hands every day to protect your hands, and you girls and best friends can do beautiful nails together!

1. Leopard print elements nail art

The leopard print is a fashion element that never goes out of style and it can easily be matched with leopard print clothing, bags and nail art. A girl with leopard print will be very attractive and beautiful. The leopard print nail art became popular at the end of 2020.I have a lot of beautiful friends around me who have done leopard nails, I also want to try, but I always feel that I do not do well, so I control the enthusiasm of my heart.

This nail art uses reddish brown and pink as the base color, it will look overall white hands. You can also choose your favorite color, and for example, using black, earthy orange, pink outline different shapes of leopard print, and then with the sweater. It looks very style and temperament.

2.Gradient fresh style nail art

For girls who go sweet and fresh style need to pay attention, in winter nail art you must avoid candy colors and fluorescent colors and other colors, which will look rather abrupt. The gradient halo color like this is a good choice, not only will not look very abrupt in winter, but also very fresh and lovely. It is recommended to choose the brighter colors of burgundy and creamy pink. These two colors are easier to look your hands whiter, a more harmonious, natural, not a complex and messy feeling. Placing the gradient halo style of painting will look more fresh and stylish.

If you add some smile of fine glitter will be more colorful, and with red shiny nail polish to do gradient is also very good-looking!

3. Black and white minimalist style nail art

Black and white are extremely simple and classic styles, and these two colors will look very high class when used for nail art. However, it is not suitable for girls with slightly darker hands. This nail is pure black and white for the finger base, and then use the brush to paint some marble pattern to the nail. The overall look is relatively simple, and there is a sense of seniority, in which the marble pattern can greatly enhance the texture of the ground.

This style is more suitable whether in winter or summer, and that black and white used to do polka dot shape or draw lines is also very good!

4.Aqua with diamond style nail art

If you have long, thin nails, you'll look great with this type of manicure! This nail art does not stick the nail piece, but use light pink milk tea color and glitter silver as the overall tone, and then use the big rhinestone and a shell piece to make the shape. The whole finger is shining brightly. Especially in the light and sunlight, this nail art will really shine.

The overall look of this type of nail will be more complex and advanced, and perfectly in line with the winter season, which is a heavy dressing. But for girls with fragile nails, it is not recommended to do this nail art directly to your own nails, because it is easy to hurt your nails and does not last a long time, nail chips are your best choice!

5.Solid wine red color nail art

Finally, attaching pictures are two nails art looks from the blogger, because this is a style that I am interested in doing, so it is not as delicate and accept your criticisms or suggestions. This nail is a darker wine red color and the same accessories. Only one nail is done with gradient halo and pure color bright flash, In the thumb, I stick a gold circle sticker, and the overall color and tone is still more suitable for winter. Surprisingly, it makes the hands very white, and under the light shine bloggers are in love with my hands!

Do you have the urge to do nail art when you see it here? The nail is not suitable to do often, but after doing it always feel like the most exquisite and elegant beauty. Reminding everyone to never use their hands to pick off the nail, it is best to wait for it to fall off naturally or specifically to unload.

entry.title: Winter nude transparent nail collection
entry.content:
Today the blogger is going to share with friends a very beautiful naked nail art collection. The nude and transparent nail is a style that many girls like very much. Especially in the autumn and winter season, a fresh naked nail, not only let the fingertips look full of spirit, but also in line with the autumn and the winter season style.

The transparent texture of nude nail will let the fingertips show a low-key and elegant temperament, and in addition to various different designs and trims, it highlights a very high face value. Even in the cold winter, there are still many girls who will choose nude transparent nail, which allows the fingertips to get more aura.

So the blogger has put together a set of nude transparent nails that are perfect for winter. It has both a very delicate face and doesn't look too cool. This will make your fingertips more sophisticated, so hurry up and take a look!

The nail art is very popular these days, and many girls are switching to simple and fashionable nail art with wrapped edges. This is especially true for nail art that is created on a naked nail surface, which looks very fresh. The nail art is a very stylish nail art with a diamond-shaped diamond in the white part, which is shiny and fashionable.


The simple and elegant round French is a nail art shape created on the naked nail surface, which has the charm of color and retains part of the original color of the nail, which looks very fresh. Even if you use a dark nail polish to create a round French style, it will not look exaggerated and will have a more natural effect. With some painted and diamond elements, it makes the fingertips look more sophisticated.

The nude transparent texture of the halo shell nail also looks very delicate. The nude nail colors with a light color create a halo effect, and then some shell pieces are added. The nails have the beautiful mood of the halo nail and the luminous texture of the shell pieces, with the aura of the cat eye nail, it's really beautiful!

The combination of cat eye nails and shell nails has a really high face value. Especially some pink jade cat eyes, which themselves have a jelly gel like translucent texture, look full of aura, with the same charming naked transparent shell nail, fullness of the girl's heart are at the fingertips.

The nail color of highly saturated color with a nude transparent texture, nail will let the fingertips get a better balance of tone. A more flamboyant color like fluorescent purple, paired with a nude and transparent diamond nail, will not exaggerate the fingertips, but also increase the sense of sophistication of the nail. The combination of chic temperament and girly style is very beautiful!

Red solid color nail with naked transparent red halo nail is also a style that many girls are trying. On the naked transparent nail surface, with red to create a halo effect, will have a warm and moving temperament. So some of the deepest red also has a gentle temperament. With the red solid color nail， it is simple and very layered and very durable.


Elegant heart French nail art is also a style that many girls like. A heart French manicure created on a nude sheer nail surface has a little more girly style playfulness than a regular French manicure. This makes the fingertips look more pleasing, and it also looks great with a nude see-through nail with heart sequins!

It is the favorite of many girls to create different shapes with diamonds on the naked nail surface, which will make the nail surface look delicate and shiny. Like the French nail art created with diamonds, its overall nail and diamond nail art, is very distinctive.

Gradient nails made with laser powder will have a cool shine that can't be achieved with regular nail art. It looks very beautiful under the light, while retaining part of the original color of the nail and reducing the exaggerated effect of the laser, making it look very girly.

The refreshing nude translucent diamond French manicure is a very popular internet celebrity manicure at the moment. Diamonds are very shiny and the French manicure created with diamonds is very recognizable, but because there is a larger area of reserved white area, it does not look exaggerated at all and is very elegant, and many girls use this manicure as a wedding nail when they get married.


Creating a gradient effect with diamonds on the nude transparent nail surface so that the nail will have a more delicate and charming shine and make the fingertips look extra charming. It looks great with a nude transparent solid color nail and a cool mirror nail.

On the naked nail surface, using red halo to make a blush nail shape and adding some delicate or luminous elements, it will have a very delicate effect. With a red solid color nail, it's high fashion and full of vitality!

A well-designed nude transparent nail is really a charming gas station for your fingertips, which will make you become full of spirit instantly. Making a beautiful nude nail, you are a charming beauty.

entry.title: 2021 Fall/Winter essential nail art!
entry.content:
A woman's beauty is from head to toe, and many women will not let go of the beauty of any detail of their bodies. The hands are the most frequently used limbs in our daily life, and they are also one of the parts that women pay the most attention to. The prevalence of nail art has brought a new pursuit of beauty to every woman, that is, the fingers can be beautiful, which has become the symbol of the new era of women.
What is the necessary nail art for this fall and winter? All of these nail art represents the popular fashion for the fall/winter season of 2021, so it is worth to talk or discuss about it specially. What kind of effect can these nail art give us, is it whitening or temperament? Whether it is the former or the latter, they are what women are constantly seeking. If you're interested, let's explore the trends for the fall and winter seasons!

1.Persimmon nail art

As the name implies, it is a persimmon nail art, which uses persimmon as the base color for the nail art, and then uses other colors as secondary shades. The purpose of this color scheme is that persimmon is a very white base color that will make your fingers look white. This is a great way to make your hands look white and not monotonous, so it's a good idea for girls who are still in school or young to try it out.
The subtlety of this nail art lies in the fact that if it had persimmon color as the main color for a large area, then this nail art would have become plain and boring. Instead, it goes the other way and chooses other light colors as secondary colors, and the whole temperament is different. The nail becomes clear and lively at the same time, which is the fashion trend for this fall and winter season.

2. Crystal jelly nail art

The nail art is very easy to understand, it is the nail art that is shaped by the nail polish with various colors. This one is mainly in peach color with blue edge of the nail head to achieve a girly look for the fall and winter season. The blue border is lively and gentle, and the simple style is not monotonous and boring. It is suitable for girls who like simple style, but also for girls who want to take a temperament style.
The clear crystal jelly also meets the temperament of the autumn and winter season, and the gentle temperament of a young girl comes through between the clear nail. The border carries a slight French temperament that is heartwarming and satisfies the basic requirement of showing white as a nail art.

3. French nail art

This black and green French nail art is slightly different from the normal French nail art, it has a cool style with a black and green tone. Many people think that French and cool are two styles, but they don't think that they can be combined. Black is the main color that gives the nail a white base, while fluorescent green brings a cool tech feel through fluorescence.
This manicure is perfect for girls who go for a cool style, because the border also completes the basic French pattern. This manicure is also considered a French gentle rebellion. It completes an innovative nail art style with a cool vibe fused with French nail art!

The nail art above is actually white in tone, so the nail art style itself is very intentional. With white as the base tone, then the other auxiliary colors can play a wonderful effect, which makes them the trend of this year. In short, the blogger was moved, I wonder if we should also try it?

entry.title: Advanced red leopard print nail art collection
entry.content:
Today the blogger is going to share with you a set of very distinctive red leopard print nail art. When it comes to leopard print nails, I believe you are no stranger to it. Leopard print nails with a unique fur texture are very popular in this autumn and winter. The various colors of leopard print nail are very characteristic, and today the blogger will have to show you this group of leopard print nail, but also the leopard print nail in a very classic color, do not miss!

Red solid color nail art is very simple and generous, even without any decoration, it will look extra popular. The fashionable qualities of leopard print nail art and red solid color nail art are very suitable, and these two styles are very suitable to combine.

Leopard nail art can also be made in many different effects, depending on the color combination of the leopard nail art. For example, a leopard print manicure created by combining red and black on a white nail surface looks very fresh and sexy at the same time, presenting a diverse charm that is perfect for girls with different personalities.

The frosted texture of leopard print nail art is also a style that many fashionistas like. The matte nail surface can better restore the fur texture of the leopard print, making the leopard print look more realistic, while also increasing the fashionable temperament of the nail, low-key and very gorgeous, fashionable and not flashy, very unique!

The leopard print nail created by combining beans and black will look showing the girly style. It is a very simple yet classy and charming nail art with a solid color of burgundy and bean paste. This color scheme will not look tacky at all, making the leopard print a fashion icon at the fingertips.

The combination of leopard print nail art and lace-up nail art is also a very popular style. The strap element is a common style in the fashion world, and combining it with leopard print to make a nail art will look extra chic and add a sense of sophistication to the fingertips without looking fancy, which is very beautiful.

Leopard print nails have a small texture and look relatively dense, so they are not suitable for a single style. If you do leopard nail art on all ten fingers, it will look fancy and have a dazzling feeling, so usually we choose a simple solid color nail with leopard nail art, which can neutralize the fancy feeling of leopard print and make the fingertips look more atmospheric.

The patchwork nail art created with leopard print and solid color looks simple and chic and will be more distinctive than the simple style.

For the sophisticated girl, you can also use leopard print nail art with some nude translucent texture luminous nail art. This will make the fingertips look shinier, like some nude translucent texture diamond nails, or nude translucent shell gold foil, nails, which will make the fingertips look more agile and look young. It's also great to mix and match with leopard print nail and red nail, which will make the whole nail look more layered!

Red leopard print nail art is perfect for girls with short nails. The simple red solid color nail art will make the fingertips look more slender by the light and shadow. The leopard print will look more delicate in a small area of the nail surface, and it looks simple and trendy with it, so that even short nail girls can keep up with the fashion trends.


Combining a red leopard print manicure on a silver sequin nail will be very unique. The signature texture of leopard print will look extra sophisticated with the glamorous glow of sequins. This unique pairing will also make the fingertips even more unique!


Red leopard print nail art and delicate whole nail diamond nail art together, so that the fingertips look exquisite and shiny charming, full of fashion temperament, really super beautiful.

Pairing a solid red manicure with a delicate leopard print manicure is a very refreshing look. Such a style would be perfect for busy working professionals. Not only will it not be a burden on your work and life, but it's very chic and brings out your workplace charm even more!

Red leopard print nail art is really beautiful, so don't miss it! If you like it, hurry up and collect it! Follow the blogger, there are different surprises every day!

entry.title: Bridal Nail Art Styles Winter 2021
entry.content:
1.Red Glitter Nail Art

Look at this new nail 2021, very festive, especially for the bride's nail, red nail mixed with gold glitter, bling bling feeling very upscale, giving people a full sense of high tone, and especially show hands white, but also more atmospheric one. A look let people fascinated feeling, big red is very suitable for winter.

2.Flower Pattern Nail Art

Very fresh and gentle nail style, the color is very understated. Plain color in the small flower pattern set off no longer look monotonous, simple and generous and vibrant sense, painted on the nail a layer of cream color, delicate and soft, fresh and sweet, temperament more outstanding, just meet you to change nail, try this new winter 2021 nail！

3.Leopard Print Frosted Nail Art

The new nail in the winter of 2021, leopard elements with frosted style, sexy and warm, looks especially noble sensational. Leopard print, frosted between the jump color design, full of details, get rid of the conventional nail earthy tone! Once dyed, you can't help but love the frosted leopard girl, it's worth trying!

4.Cat's Eye Blue Manicure

The blue temperament, looks energetic and gentle, this winter's warm new cat eye, nail style, durable and white, really nice. Anyway, Jessica is moved, senior sense full of cat eye, nail plus glitter embellishment, with just the right amount of beauty, simply good to see a burst of nail, super like, feel photos can not reflect its beauty, or experience it in person.

5.Green Nail Art

Green gives a very clean feeling, this winter's new style. The winter atmosphere you can not miss , which is very light and contain green and polka dot nail combination, can be said to be very gentle wind. It's white and green, visually have a strong contrast visual impact, giving a very unique feeling, and the hands look very white. When the moment of swinging fingers, it shows the formation of a lively sense of activity!

entry.title: The Top 5 Little Fresh Nail Art In Autumn
entry.content:
​Hands are our second face of women, so many of our friends are very fond of doing nail art, especially now in autumn, do some beautiful, white-looking style can make people feel good, so what is the autumn little fresh nail art in the end? What is the hottest? Today, I will bring you a detail introduction.

1. Shiny Gold Nail Art

​Although it has to be applied to real life, these gorgeous and advanced nail styles are something that you can not help but try. Many peeps select elongated styles to bring out their high-end feel, but for the convenience of life, these shorts are also perfect. Use your favorite color as a base, then apply shiny gold on top, these somewhat monotonous appearance, become instantly luxurious. For instance, this pink nail art with the addition of shining gold looks very special.

2. White Small Flower Nail Art

​These solid color mirror nails are still loved by many young in real life. The so-called plain mirror color is a nail art that is chosen with a single color, with no additional color added. Combined with the smooth appearance, it looks shiny when exposed to light or sunlight. Naturally there will be people who don't like this slightly monotonous nail art, so adding a few small touches can be an effective solution to this problem. This fishing manicure with the small white flower added on top is very soft and soft.

3. White Edge Nail Art

​If you don't want to add small white flowers, you think the accents are a bit brusque. There are many other options at this point, after all, nail art can be whatever you want it to be, and if you are handy enough, you can totally design it for yourself. The nail is painted with a colour and a white border is added at the top. This style of nail art is quite popular amongst girls nowadays. Not only does it add a vivid colour, but it also looks very neat.

​The nail art above, in its entirety, is pink and then a white border is painted on top. The combination of soft pink and vivid white, is unique and distinctive. This one has a blue border, which is as pink overall, but the color is lighter than the one above. This nail art looks very cool and enjoyable after adding a blue border. This way, you can see that the colour of the ridge can be chosen at will.

4. Color Blocking Nail Art

​Like the side nail art, which is also made up of two colors, the color blocking nail art is worth a try. This nail art, composed of blue and white, is perfect for light autumn days and brings a touch of pleasure to the heart. This nail art is slightly different, since it is only on the ring finger. If you think it's a bit monotonous, you can freely choose the color that you want to put together, and it's not limited to one color. In addition, you can choose a color combination on each nail, but this will look a bit tedious.

5. Color Jumping Nail Art

​Last but not least, I would like to share with you a color jumping manicure. As the name suggests, color jumping means that the nails are one color apart but different. The one I'm introducing is made up of green and white, with white on the thumb, middle finger and little finger, and green on the index finger and ring finger. The two colors set off each other and look very original and unique.

entry.title: Burgundy Nail Art Collection For Autumn 2021
entry.content:
When fall arrives, it's time for a new manicurist! You need a nail form that can show the white, it's time for a wave of "maroon" nails. The nails of Burgundy are rich and magnificent, both magnificent and fresh, bringing a lasting and generous temperament.Here are a few "burgundy" nail art that will show off your white hands.

Recently, this chic, lightweight luxury nail is very popular, with the dark maroon color as the main color, super white, with diamond elements. The nail with his own sense of temper, both romantic and trendy, seems very excited about it?

The basic color of autumn nail is partial carrion color, with the snowflakes show beauty, with the elk like a little princess in Christmas. You can feel the lively atmosphere when you paint on your fingertips!

Who says that burgundy can not create small freshness, match with clear colors, and it can also be harnessed by young girls. Transparent colour and burgundy interval, dotted elements to bring a vintage freshness, for burgundy to bring a feeling of freshness. Bordeaux is very inclusive and is great for black and yellow hands.

In autumn, the matte matte makeup effect became popular, and the bright glitter of the makeup is different. Matte will seem more advanced, and the season corresponding to the full sense of cool, chic and beautiful!

In early autumn, our nail art can continue to continue the qualities of summer, like some lively colors, or some relatively clear shell jump colors, which are also still popular in early autumn.

It is the most popular color in the fashion world, and it exudes the charming atmosphere of red wine, which is both elegant and understated luxury, interpreting the femininity to the fullest. The actual nail art is a very good choice for the nail.

Red nails show very white skin tone, so they also give a cool look. The light in autumn will look dull, choose dark red and the milk tea color combination will focus the light to the nail of the girl's dress looks brighter. In addition to this halo style highlights rich and energetic girl's atmosphere.

Beige is also a very gentle color which is chosen with burgundy jump color show extraordinarily versatile. At the fingertips embellished with some diamonds, exquisite design seems to make nails look small, but not lose elegance, just like a genie in the air. Other fingertips as long as a little embellished with a little line are very good-looking.

The combination of small flower patterns and burgundy frosted nails together really look good. To be honest, it is very heartwarming for the nail at the first look. Not only show hands white and also super good-looking, the flower pattern are lifelike and exquisite. Such a color lining shows a small touch of freshness and makes people feel comfortable.

Pearl nail art has been a wave of trend for a while now, it can be as proud as a little princess, or as dignified as a queen, and as rosy as a little girl. Choosing a finger edge glued with a small pearl, it is really simple and durable! No matter which season it is, it can shine.
